inclusion.criterion: Patients with histologically proven intracranial malignant glioma are eligible.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine, which is a type of malignant glioma.

inclusion.criterion: All patients must sign an informed consent
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must be > 18 years old, and with a life expectancy > 8 weeks.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have a Karnofsky performance status of > 60.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have recovered from the toxic effects of prior therapy
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has completed radiation and chemotherapy, but it's unclear if they've fully recovered.

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have adequate bone marrow function (WBC > 3,000/µl, ANC > 1,500/mm^3, platelet count of > 100,000/mm^3, and hemoglobin > 10 gm/dl)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have shown radiographic evidence for tumor progression by MRI or CT scan.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has a spinal cord conus mass that is progressive.

exclusion.criterion: Patients with a history of any other cancer (except non-melanoma skin cancer or carcinoma in-situ of the cervix), unless in complete remission and off of all therapy for that disease for a minimum of 3 years are ineligible.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: Patient has anaplastic astrocytoma, but it's unclear if they've had other cancers.

exclusion.criterion: Patients must not have active infection or serious intercurrent medical illness.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with 7/7 (homozygous) UGT1A1*28 genotyping will be excluded from the study.
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

notes: Unclear if patient has fully recovered from prior therapy, and their Karnofsky performance status. Also unclear about their bone marrow function and active infections.
